entry.title: nicferrier/emacs-framesize
entry.summary:
allow frame font size to be controlled with keys.

= Framesize - adjusting framesize =

This let's you change the font size of a frame. Any buffer displayed in the frame will have the same font size.

This is useful for presenting where the thing you here the most when live coding is //"can you make it bigger?"//

{{{frame-font-keychord-init}}} can be used to initialize this to automatically bind this to keychords, something like:

{{{ (add-hook 'after-init-hook 'frame-font-keychord-init) }}}

This binds the following keychords:

| {{{fv}}} | make the frame bigger | | {{{fc}}} | make the frame smaller |
